mapper.select: INSERT INTO T2_REQUEST_APP_TBL (ROOM_NO, RENT_NO, LEISURE_NO) VALUES (#{selectRoom}, #{selectRent}, #{selectLeisure)
mapper.update: UPDATE T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL SET STATE = 'A' WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN (#{selectRoom}, #{selectRent}, #{selectLeisure});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM T2_PACKAGE_REQUEST_TBL P INNER JOIN T2_ROOM_TBL S ON S.ROOM_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO INNER JOIN T2_STAY_TBL S1 ON S.STAY_NO = S1.STAY_NO WHERE PRODUCT_KIND = 'STAY';
